title: FOIA Request: Crime Complaints Filed with the Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all crime complaints filed with the Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3) between 01 Jan 2010 and 31 Dec 2024.

I request that the complaints be provided in as granular a format as possible, including all relevant fields recorded in the IC3 database.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kenny Phua

title: Christina Riford Little and WIVB Ch. 4 Dan Telvock - Buffalo, NY emails

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Christina Riford Little and WIVB Ch. 4 Dan Telvock - Buffalo, NY emails
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.) Copies of all emails sent by Christina Riford Little and received by WIVB Ch. 4 Dan Telvock in 2019
2.) Copies of all email sent by WIVB Ch. 4 Dan Telvock  and received by Christina Little in 2019

I've attached copies for reference.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family
